author: m.kalinin
content: Miners decision on keeping or not mining legacy PoW chain doesn't matter for the Merge. Once the first PoS block with execution payload is finalized signifying that transition to PoS has happened PoW chain will have no matter to the canonical Ethereum whatever is happening there.
